item.title: Example: Dual Content Post
item.description: Understanding Hugo: A Personal Journey Link to heading When I first discovered Hugo, I was struggling with the slow build times of my Jekyll blog. Every time I wanted to preview a change, I had to wait several minutes for the site to rebuild. This was frustrating and killed my writing momentum. Why I Chose Hugo Link to heading After researching various static site generators, Hugo stood out for several practical reasons:
